context.title: DNA Server View
context.description: Ther DNA Server View shows all registered servers and their repositories and workspaces.

context.title: Server Dialog
context.description: The DNA Server Dialog allows you to edit or create a server that hosts one or more DNA repositories.

context.title: DNA Publish and Unpublish Dialog Help
context.description: The DNA Publish/Unpublish Dialog uploads or removes selected resources from a selected DNA server.

context.title: DNA Preferences Dialog Help
context.description: The DNA Preferences Dialog allows you to identify file extensions and folder names that should not be involved in publishing operations.

context.title: DNA Message Console
context.description: The DNA Message Console contains the output from the publishing and unpublishing operations.
